page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT IN WEDMORE AREA
page.content: Many of those living in the Wedmore area{travel to work}in the cities and towns nearby e.g. Bristol, Wells, Street and Cheddar. Here they are employed in business or in office and factory work. Blackford in particular has become a{dormitary village. Those who remain to work in the vicinity of Wedmore are employed in {agriculture}or the{small businesses}of the village. These include shopkeeping, building, carpentry, roofing, motor engineering, and a leather goods company. Therefore many are{self_employed}and often young people leaving school begin to work with their parents. There are some leavers who have not yet found work, but unemployment is not a great problem. A large number of{retired}people live in the villages.
